sentences.en: He is planning to go on a pilgrimage to Mecca.
He was on his annual pilgrimage to Mecca when he fell ill.
sentences.cn: 他在一年一度前往麦加朝圣的途中病倒了.

sentences.en: He went to Mecca as a pilgrim.
His Batley Variety Club became a mecca for high-class acts and mass audiences.
sentences.cn: 他的“巴特利综艺俱乐部”成了一流演员和广大观众热捧的地方。

sentences.en: Hostilities followed between Mecca and Medina which ended at last in a treaty.
sentences.cn: 于是麦加与麦地那之间进入战争状态,最后只好以签订条约了结此事.

sentences.en: In 1939, New York city was a mecca for the theater.
sentences.cn: 1939年, 纽约城堪称戏剧界的圣地.

sentences.en: It is a tourist mecca. The water and mountains are marvelous.
sentences.cn: 这里真不愧是旅游胜地, 山光水色异常秀美.

sentences.en: London in the fifties was a mecca for nationalist leaders.
sentences.cn: 50年代的伦敦是民族主义领导人朝拜的地方.

sentences.en: Many people go on a pilgrimage to Mecca or Jerusalem.
sentences.cn: 许多人前往麦加或耶路撒冷朝圣.

sentences.en: Thailand has become the tourist mecca of Asia.
sentences.cn: 泰国已经成为亚洲旅游胜地。

sentences.en: The coast is a mecca for tourists.
sentences.cn: 沿海一带是旅游的热门景点。

sentences.en: The face of the worshipper must be turned towards Mecca.
The leaders are expected to fly to Mecca in the next few days to seal the agreement.
sentences.cn: 领导人将在接下来的几天中飞往麦加签署协议。

sentences.en: This exhibition is a mecca for stamp collectors.
sentences.cn: 这个展览会是集邮者都想去的地方.

sentences.en: Under his leadership they recaptured the holy city Mecca, where the Prophet had been scorned.
sentences.cn: 在他的领导之下,他们重新占领了先知曾受轻视的圣城麦加.

sentences.en: We met many pilgrims on their way to Mecca
sentences.cn: 我们遇到许多去麦加朝圣的人。

trans.tran_cn: 麦加（沙特阿拉伯一座城市），朝拜的地方，仰慕的目标，发源地
trans.tran_en: a place that many people want to visit for a particular reason
